General.Name: Jiangxi Hongcheng Waterworks Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Hongcheng Environment Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and supply of tap water in China. The company is also involved in the operation of sewage treatment plants and solid waste. In addition. it engages in the production and supply of natural gases, provision of engineering services, and other businesses. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Hongcheng Waterworks Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangxi Hongcheng Environment Co., Ltd. in February 2021. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanchang, China.
